meanings.sent1: She finally attained her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: He attained the highest score in the class.
meanings.sent3: After years of hard work, she attained her goal and felt proud.
meanings.sent4: His dedication and effort helped him attain success in his career.
meanings.sent5: The student's determination to study hard allowed her to attain her academic goals.

meanings.definition: To reach a certain age or level
meanings.sent1: He attained the age of 50 last month.
meanings.sent2: The tree has attained a height of over 10 feet.
meanings.sent3: The car finally attained the speed limit on the highway.
meanings.sent4: The company has attained a new level of success this year.
meanings.sent5: The athlete has attained a level of fitness that is impressive.

meanings.definition: To come to or arrive at a destination
meanings.sent1: The train finally attained the station after a long journey.
meanings.sent2: The hikers attained the mountain peak just before sunset.
meanings.sent3: The package finally attained its destination after a delay.
meanings.sent4: The ship attained the port after a smooth voyage.
meanings.sent5: The bird attained its nest after flying across the field.
